remarks: The multiplicative identity of the quotient ring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)
statement:
qusring.u $e |- U = ( R /s ( R ~QG S ) ) $.
qusring.i $e |- I = ( 2Ideal ` R ) $.
qus1.o $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
qus1 $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. I ) -> ( U e. Ring /\ [ .1. ] ( R ~QG S ) = ( 1r ` U ) ) ) $.
